avatar.description_zh: 要显示的 Avatar 元素。

children.description: This prop isn't supported. Use the component prop if you need to change the children structure.
children.description_zh: 不支持此道具。如果需要更改子结构，请使用组件 prop。

classes.description: Override or extend the styles applied to the component.See CSS classes API below for more details.
classes.description_zh: 覆盖或扩展应用于组件的样式。有关详细信息，请参阅下面的 CSS 类 API。

clickable.description: If true, the chip will appear clickable, and will raise when pressed, even if the onClick prop is not defined. If false, the chip will not appear clickable, even if onClick prop is defined. This can be used, for example, along with the component prop to indicate an anchor Chip is clickable. Note: this controls the UI and does not affect the onClick event.
clickable.description_zh: 如果为 true，则芯片将显示为可点击，并且在按下时会升起，即使未定义 onClick 道具也是如此。如果为 false，即使定义了 onClick prop，芯片也不会显示为可点击。例如，这可以与组件 prop 一起使用，以指示锚点 Chip 是可点击的。注意：这将控制 UI，并且不会影响 onClick 事件。

color.description: The color of the component. It supports both default and custom theme colors, which can be added as shown in the palette customization guide.
color.description_zh: 组件的颜色。它支持默认和自定义主题颜色，可以按照调色板自定义指南中所示进行添加。
color.type: default| primary| secondary| error| info| success| warning| string

component.description: The component used for the root node. Either a string to use a HTML element or a component.
component.description_zh: 用于根节点的组件。使用 HTML 元素或组件的字符串。

deleteIcon.description: Override the default delete icon element. Shown only if onDelete is set.
deleteIcon.description_zh: 覆盖默认的删除图标元素。仅当设置了 onDelete 时才显示。

disabled.description: If true, the component is disabled.
disabled.description_zh: 如果为 true，则禁用该组件。

onDelete.description: Callback fired when the delete icon is clicked. If set, the delete icon will be shown.
onDelete.description_zh: 单击删除图标时触发回调。如果设置，将显示删除图标。

skipFocusWhenDisabled.description: If true, allows the disabled chip to escape focus. If false, allows the disabled chip to receive focus.
skipFocusWhenDisabled.description_zh: 如果为 true，则允许禁用的芯片逃避焦点。如果为 false，则允许禁用的芯片接收焦点。

sx.description: The system prop that allows defining system overrides as well as additional CSS styles.See the `sx` page for more details.
sx.description_zh: 允许定义系统覆盖以及其他 CSS 样式的系统属性。有关更多详细信息，请参阅“sx”页面。

events.name: onDelete
events.description: Callback fired when the delete icon is clicked. If set, the delete icon will be shown.
events.description_zh: 单击删除图标时触发回调。如果设置，将显示删除图标。
